task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)

about: Generate, refactor, and debug code with AI assistance. Check out our <DocsLink>documentation</DocsLink> to learn more.
onboarding: Your task list in this workspace is empty.

boomerangTasks.title: Boomerang Tasks
boomerangTasks.description: Split tasks into smaller, manageable parts

stickyModels.title: Sticky Models
stickyModels.description: Each mode remembers your last used model

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Allow the AI to solve problems by browsing the web, running commands, and more

customizableModes.title: Customizable Modes
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas with their own behaviors and assigned models

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
addContext: @ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

instructions.wantsToFetch: TNE-Code wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: TNE-Code wants to read this file:
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: TNE-Code wants to read multiple files:
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: TNE-Code wants to read this file and {{count}} more:
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: TNE-Code wants to read this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: TNE-Code wants to edit this file:
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: TNE-Code wants to edit this file outside of the workspace:
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: TNE-Code wants to create a new file:
fileOperations.wantsToSearchReplace: TNE-Code wants to search and replace in this file:
fileOperations.didSearchReplace: TNE-Code performed search and replace on this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: TNE-Code wants to insert content into this file:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: TNE-Code wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}:
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: TNE-Code wants to append content to the end of this file:

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: TNE-Code wants to view the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: TNE-Code viewed the top level files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: TNE-Code wants to recursively view all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: TNE-Code recursively viewed all files in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: TNE-Code wants to view source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: TNE-Code viewed source code definition names used in this directory:
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: TNE-Code wants to search this directory for {{regex}}:

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: TNE-Code wants to search the codebase for {{query}}:
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: TNE-Code wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}:

mcp.wantsToUseTool: TNE-Code wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server:
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: TNE-Code wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server:

modes.wantsToSwitch: TNE-Code wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: TNE-Code wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: TNE-Code wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode:
subtasks.wantsToFinish: TNE-Code wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve:
autoApprove.description: Auto-approve allows TNE-Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust. More detailed configuration available in <settingsLink>Settings</settingsLink>.

announcement.title: ðŸŽ‰ TNE-Code {{version}} Released
announcement.description: TNE-Code {{version}} brings powerful new features and improvements based on your feedback.
announcement.feature1: <bold>Intelligent Context Condensing Enabled by Default</bold>: Context condensing is now enabled by default with configurable settings for when automatic condensing happens
announcement.feature2: <bold>Manual Condensing Button</bold>: New button in the task header allows you to manually trigger context condensing at any time
announcement.feature3: <bold>Enhanced Condensing Settings</bold>: Fine-tune when and how automatic condensing occurs through the <contextSettingsLink>Context Settings</contextSettingsLink>
announcement.detailsDiscussLinks: Get more details and discuss in <discordLink>Discord</discordLink> and <redditLink>Reddit</redditLink> ðŸš€

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

browser.rooWantsToUse: TNE-Code wants to use the browser:

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile violates your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the TNE-Code settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: TNE-Code has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?
